title: 04/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Louis Riddick
itunes:title: 04/19/21 DPS Hour 1 Louis Riddick
description:
Louis Riddick tells Dan that the next, best, can't miss player in the draft behind Trevor Lawrence would be Ja'Marr Chase from LSU.
